title: Studio in Ballard, Spacious Closet, Abundant Natural Light, Balcony

neighborhood in Seattle, Washington, KOI offers spacious apartment homes.', 'Relax on our rooftop deck; hang with your friends and neighbors around the fire pit.', 'Get a work-out in at our Fully Dryer in unit', '- Stainless Steel Whirlpool Appliances', '- Private patios on every unit', '- Hardwood flooring', '- Abundant Natural Light', '- Granite Countertops', 'Community Amenities', '- Fantastic Coffee Machine w/ espresso, hot cocoa and more!', '- Smoke-free building', '- Bicycle Garage for $20 monthly', '- Extra Storage closets starting at $95 per month', '- WalkScore = 92', '- Spacious Clubhouse with Fireplace', '- 24 hour fitness center with State of the art cardio studio and Strength training equipment', '- Controlled access property', '- Walk to Ballard Farmers Market', '- Reserved, garage parking space for $160 monthly', '- Resident Website w/ Online Bill Pay, Work Orders and more', '- Easy access to public transportation', '- Courtyard with massive gas fire pit', '- 2 Gas BBQ Grilling areas', '- Rooftop deck w/ views & Wi-Fi access', '- Electric car charging stations', '- Package Concierge Lockers for 24 hour access', 'Driving Directions', 'Location is King!', 'Ideal Ballard location provides commuters with instant connectivity to the best of Seattle, and offers residents easy access to bus routes, Interstate 5, Route 99 as well as local shopping, restaurants and entertainment venues.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'KOI treats your pets are a part of the family, with complimentary MudBay treats at the office every day!', '-2 pet maximum per apartment home', '-Pet deposit of $300', '-Pet Rent of $50 per pet', "Restricted Breeds: Pit Bull Terriers/Staffordshire Terriers, Rottweiler's, Doberman Pinschers, Chows, Presa Canarios, Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, Wolf-Hybrids", 'Please contact our leasing professionals for more information.', 'Income Requirements:', "Applicant's gross income must be 3 times the monthly rent.", 'Guarantors accepted!', 'Must have 5x the monthly rent as income and good credit.', 'We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant
